languages.text: {n}Кажется, ваш комплимент не пришелся по душе Регине. С вежливой улыбкой она делает шаг назад. Махарий заметно успокаивается, но все еще следит за каждым вашим движением.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Кажется, ваш комплимент показался Регине... нелепым. С вежливой улыбкой она делает шаг назад. Махарий заметно успокаивается, но все еще следит за каждым вашим движением.{/n}

languages.text: {n}It seems that Regina did not like your compliment. She takes a step back, smiling politely. Macharius visibly relaxes, but he continues to watch your every move.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кажется, ваш комплимент не пришелся по душе Регине. С вежливой улыбкой она делает шаг назад. Махарий заметно успокаивается, но все еще следит за каждым вашим движением.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}It seems that Regina did not like your compliment. She takes a step backwards, smiling politely. Macharias seems to have calmed down, but he is still watching your every move.{/n}
{n}It seems that Regina did not like your compliment. She takes a step backwards, smiling politely. Macharias seems to have calmed down, but he is still watching your every move.{/n}
{n}It seems that Regina did not like your compliment. She takes a step back, smiling politely. Macharius seems to have calmed down but he is still watching your every move.{/n}
{n}It seems that Regina did not like your compliment. She takes a step back, smiling politely. Macharius seems to have calmed down but he is still watching your every move.{/n}
{n}It seems that Regina did not like your compliment. She takes a step back, smiling politely. Macharius visibly relaxes, but he continues to watch your every move.{/n}
{n}It seems that Regina did not like your compliment. She takes a step back, smiling politely. Macharius visibly relaxes, but he continues to watch your every move.{/n}

languages.text: {n}レジーナはあなたのお世辞が気に入らなかったようだ。彼女は一歩下がって失礼のないようにほほえむ。マハリウスは目に見えてリラックスしているが、まだあなたの一挙手一投足を注視している。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems that Regina did not like your compliment. She takes a step back, smiling politely. Macharius visibly relaxes, but he continues to watch your every move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}レジーナはあなたのお世辞が気に入らなかったようだ。彼女は一歩下がって失礼のないようにほほえむ。マハリウスは目に見えてリラックスしているが、まだあなたの一挙手一投足を注視している。{/n}

languages.text: {n}蕾吉娜似乎不吃你这套。她脸上挂着礼貌的微笑，向后退了一步。马卡里乌斯明显放松了很多，但依然目不转睛地盯着你的一举一动。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems that Regina did not like your compliment. She takes a step back, smiling politely. Macharius visibly relaxes, but he continues to watch your every move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}蕾吉娜似乎不吃你这套。她脸上挂着礼貌的微笑，向后退了一步。马卡里乌斯似乎冷静下来了，但依然目不转睛地盯着你的一举一动。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Régina n'a pas l'air d'avoir particulièrement apprécié votre compliment. Elle se contente d'un sourire poli tout en reculant d'un pas, ce qui semble apaiser Macharius, mais ne l'empêche pas de continuer à surveiller le moindre de vos gestes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems that Regina did not like your compliment. She takes a step back, smiling politely. Macharius visibly relaxes, but he continues to watch your every move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Régina n'a pas l'air d'avoir particulièrement apprécié votre compliment. Elle se contente d'un sourire poli tout en reculant d'un pas. Macharius, quant à lui, semble s'être calmé, mais continue à surveiller le moindre de vos gestes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Parece que a Regina no le ha gustado tu cumplido. Da un paso hacia atrás, sonriendo educadamente. Macharius se relaja claramente, pero sigue observándote de cerca.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems that Regina did not like your compliment. She takes a step back, smiling politely. Macharius visibly relaxes, but he continues to watch your every move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Parece que a Regina no le ha gustado tu cumplido. Da un paso hacia atrás, sonriendo educadamente. Macharius parece haberse calmado, pero sigue observándote de cerca.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Regina hat dein Kompliment offenbar nicht gefallen. Sie tritt einen Schritt zurück und lächelt höflich. Macharius entspannt sich sichtlich, doch er beobachtet weiter jede deiner Bewegungen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems that Regina did not like your compliment. She takes a step back, smiling politely. Macharius visibly relaxes, but he continues to watch your every move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Regina hat dein Kompliment offenbar nicht gefallen. Sie tritt einen Schritt zurück und lächelt höflich. Macharius scheint sich beruhigt zu haben, doch er beobachtet weiterhin jede deiner Bewegungen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Görünüşe göre Regina, iltifatından hoşnut kalmıyor. Kibarca gülümseyip geriye bir adım atıyor. Macharius rahatlasa da hâlâ senin her hareketini izliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems that Regina did not like your compliment. She takes a step back, smiling politely. Macharius visibly relaxes, but he continues to watch your every move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Görünüşe göre Regina, iltifatından hoşnut değil. Kibarca gülümseyip geriye bir adım atıyor. Macharius rahatlasa da hâlâ her hareketini izliyor.{/n}
